name: MetadataRenamer
description: MetadataRenamer automatically renames series folders, season folders, and episode files when you identify a series in Jellyfin. Series format: {SeriesName} ({Year}) [{provider}-{id}], for example: 'The Flash (2014) [tvdb-279121]'. For anime and long-running shows, when metadata reports Season 1 but files are in Season 2+ folders, the plugin keeps episodes in the correct season folder. Renames when provider IDs change, with dry-run mode, collision checks, and per-item cooldown.

versions.changelog: Fix: path/filename-derived season; process episodes with null IndexNumber/ParentIndexNumber; skip cooldown during bulk.
Fix: path/filename-derived season; process episodes with null IndexNumber/ParentIndexNumber; skip cooldown during bulk.

overview: Renames series folders, season folders, and episode files; keeps episodes in correct season folders when metadata misreports season.
